Name: Charm Bow
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cherubi and Cherrim.  You can get a Charm Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Cherubi Seed, a Cherubi Card, and a Cute Ore. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
